#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define MAXSIZE 101

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i, j, k, n1, n2;
	char *s1, *s2;

	scanf("%d", &t );
	while( t-- ) {
	
		s1 = new char[ MAXSIZE ];
		s2 = new char[ MAXSIZE ];
			
		scanf("%s %s", s1, s2 );

		j = 0;
		n1 = strlen( s1 );
		n2 = strlen( s2 );
		
		for( i = 0;i < n1;i++ ) {
			
			if( s1[ i ] == s2[ j ] )
				j++;		
		}		

		k = 0;

		for( i = ( n1 - 1 );i >= 0;i-- ) {
			
			if( s1[ i ] == s2[ k ] )
				k++;		
		}		
		
		if( ( j == n2 ) && ( k == n2 ) )
			printf("3\n");
		else if( j == n2 )
			printf("1\n");
		else if( k == n2 )
			printf("2\n");
		else
			printf("0\n");

		delete s1;
		delete s2;
			
	}
	
	return 0;
}
